query:
SELECT t.id as turmaId, t.codigo, COUNT(DISTINCT f.id) as total_formandos, COUNT(DISTINCT e.id) as total_eventos
FROM turmas t
LEFT JOIN formandos f ON f.turmaId = t.id
LEFT JOIN eventos e ON e.turmaId = t.id AND e.dataEvento IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY t.id, t.codigo
HAVING total_formandos > 0 AND total_eventos > 0
LIMIT 1

LEFT JOIN formandos f ON f.turmaId = t.id
LEFT JOIN eventos e ON e.turmaId = t.id AND e.dataEvento IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY t.id, t.codigo
HAVING total_formandos > 0 AND total_eventos > 0
LIMIT 1
